name: quick-web-cipherpad
description: Simple notepad script for modern web browsers with cipher functions

scripts.minify: curl -s -d compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS -d output_format=text -d output_info=compiled_code -d charset=utf-8 --data-urlencode 'js_code@-' http://closure-compiler.appspot.com/compile < bundled_.js > minified_.js
scripts.make: npm run htmlminify && npm run bundle && npm run minify && node make-installer.js minified_.html minified_.js installer.html
